utils module¶

utils.get_abspath_from_project_root(_path: str) → str[source]¶
utils.join_paths(path1: str, *paths) → str[source]¶
utils.load_func_from_disk(name: str, folder_path: str = None) → Callable[source]¶

Loads a saved function from disk, using dill.

Parameters

  • name – Name of the dill file stored in saved-elements/funcs/.

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the function is stored in disk.

Returns

The function load from disk.

utils.load_obj_from_disk(name: str, folder_path: str = None) → object[source]¶

Loads a saved object from disk, using pickle.

Parameters

  • name – Name of the pickle file stored in saved-elements/objects/.

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the object is stored in disk.

Returns

The object load from disk.

utils.now_as_str() → str[source]¶
Returns

The current time as str.

utils.pretty_print(text: str)[source]¶

Prints the given text with an underscore line below it.

utils.save_func_to_disk(func: Callable, name: str, folder_path: str = None)[source]¶

Stores a function on disk, using dill.

Parameters

  • func – Function to be stored in disk.

  • name – Name of the dill file to be created in saved-elements/funcs/ and

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the function will be stored in disk.

utils.save_obj_to_disk(obj: object, name: str, folder_path: str = None)[source]¶

Stores an object on disk, using pickle.

Parameters

  • obj – Object to be stored in disk.

  • name – Name of the pickle file to be created in saved-elements/objects/ and

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the object will be stored in disk.
